title: 崩溃报告，请帮忙查明原因。
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2020-4-13 19:58 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't do that.

Time: 20-4-12 下午5:30
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -4140
